pages.text: Treasure enchantments are special enchantments that are typically unavailable in the Enchanting Table.$(p)However, this can be remedied with a $(9)Deepshelf of Arcane Treasures$().

pages.title: Arcane Treasures
pages.text: Placing this bookshelf in a valid slot will cause treasure enchantments to appear while enchanting.$(p)Bear in mind that most $(4)Curses$() are treasure enchantments.
